articles.title: India-Middle East Economic Corridor Possible Reason For Hamas Attack: Biden - NDTV
articles.description: US President Joe Biden has hinted that one of the reasons behind Hamas' October 7 attack on Israel was the recent announcement of the India-Middle East-Europe Economic Corridor that integrates the entire region with a network of rail,
articles.content:
He said that the rail port project is part of an effort to build a more sustainable Middle East.
